AssetBase.Name: Today's algebra lesson was difficult.. I wonder if Gooble can help!
You awake in a strange land and run into strange man..
To perform the addition operator you must add together the operands. EX: 2+4=6
Don't worry! You can try again.
Have a safe journey back to your world!
After defeating lord calcutron, sir solvesalot takes tou back to the warp zone that will take you back to your own world.
What a great game! I learned so much.
